Original:
J's Place 是個蠻 Chill 的餐酒館，
裝潢很有古歐洲風格
離國父紀念館 2 號出口
大概走路 8 分鐘左右
當天是周一晚上來，只有 2-3 桌客人，
蠻安靜舒服的
很適合一小群人來聊天打屁

店內有吧台、桌子，目測約７－８桌
餐點大部分都是義大利麵和沙拉，
選的是三顆星辣度的麵大蒜辣椒義大利麵
我個人吃蠻辣，這個麵還真的挺辣的，
不吃辣的建議別選
酒的話有經典調酒、紅白酒、
純的酒等等選項
我覺得調酒品質比較普通，食物比較好一些

價格還合理，支援信用卡，
沒有電子發票載具，這點可惜
下班來聊天蠻適合的一站
EN:
J's Place is a pretty Chill dining tavern,
The decoration is very ancient European style
Exit 2 of the Father Memorial Hall
About 8 minutes by walking
The same day came on Monday night, only 2-3 table guests,
Quite quiet and comfortable
Very suitable for a small group to chat and fart

There is a bar or a table in the shop, and about 7-8 tables visually
Most of the meals are Italian noodles and salads,
Choose three stars with spicy noodles, garlic pepper pasta
I personally eat very spicy, this face is really spicy,
Do not choose not to eat spicy food
In the case of wine, there are classic alcohol, red and white wine,
Pure wine and other options
I think the quality of bartender is relatively ordinary, and the food is better

The price is reasonable, support credit card,
There is no electronic invoice vehicle, this is a pity
It's a suitable stop to chat from get off work

Original:
週五晚上前往用餐，入內時大概坐滿五成。點完餐後，超過半小時，連啤酒都還沒有上。詢問店員只得到「今天只有一位廚師，餐點都要等」的不耐煩回答。

其實要等餐點不是問題，但入內時並未告知，事後詢問店員態度又極不耐煩、啤酒也沒有先上（半小時後我們自己要求才上的）。

重點是店員的態度，雖然後來有好轉，但用餐心情已經被毀了。

餐點的部分，義大利麵醬汁濃郁，很不錯。辣雞翅則是沒先炸過，而且皮非常肥，吃了很膩。薯條更是鹹到我們整盤沒吃，可能是廚師一人太忙手抖灑太多鹽吧，或是在報復我們因餐點上太慢而不悅？（我是連麥當勞薯條冷掉都還吃得下去的人）。
EN:
Go to dinner on Friday night, and about 50 % when you enter.After ordering, more than half an hour, not even beer.Ask the clerk to get an impatient answer to "There is only one chef today, and the meals are waiting".

In fact, it is not a problem to wait for the meal, but it was not informed when I entered. I asked the clerk's attitude and was extremely impatient, and the beer was not put first (we asked for it after half an hour).

The focus is on the attitude of the clerk. Although it has improved later, the mood of dining has been destroyed.

For the meal, the pasta sauce is strong and very good.The spicy chicken wings have not been fried first, and the skin is very fat, and it is greasy.The fries are so salty that we did n’t eat the whole market. Maybe the chef is too busy to shake too much salt, or is it too slow to get back because the meal is too slow?(I am a person who can even eat McDonald's fries coldly).

Original: 餐點都很好吃，服務也很親切，酒類品項也算多，沒有用餐時間限制更是貼心的地方。適合三五好友聚餐聊天。
EN: The meals are delicious, the service is very kind, and there are many alcohol items. There is no meal time limit.Suitable for three or five friends to dinner and chat.

Original:
第一次跟著朋友來就喜歡上的小酒吧！不論是食物、酒、環境還是服務，都非常滿意。

沙拉的生菜新鮮、爽脆，份量很足夠，佐醬也恰如其分。義大利麵（本次是點「老闆麵」，帶辣有培根）口味適中不會過鹹，如果偏好比較有口感的麵條，應該會喜歡。蒜味薯條建議趁熱吃，外酥內軟（熱的最好吃，但冷掉也沒有油耗味！）燻鮭魚冷盤的鮭魚是比較彈牙的那種，配上酸豆的香氣，非常下酒。

老闆很貼心親切，由於酒上得比餐點快些，有勸阻我們空腹就點太濃烈的餐前調酒XD 出餐的速度並不算快，但因為環境舒服酒好喝，聊著聊著也就順順地吃到了。

老闆送上長島時很自信地說絕對順口，喝了之後完全明白這自信從何而來，真心順。愉悅的酒感大概會掛到顴骨一般高的，所謂舒服但不會令人失態的位子（酒是濃的，平常不喝酒的朋友建議可以點酒前先跟老闆討論）。

會再訪的好店！
EN:
The first time I came with my friends and liked it!Whether it is food, wine, environment or service, they are very satisfied.

The salad's lettuce is fresh and crispy, the portion is enough, and the sauce is just right.The pasta (this time is the "boss noodle", with spicy and bacon), the taste will not be too salty. If the preferences are more tasteful, you should like it.Garlic flavored fries are recommended to eat while it is hot, soft and soft outside (the best hot, but there is no fuel consumption!) Summitted salmon cold salmon is a more elastic type. Get wine.

The boss is very intimate. Because the wine is faster than the meal, there are persuasion to discourage that the an empty stomach is too strong before meals. XD meals are not fast, but because the environment is comfortable and drinks. It was eaten smoothly.

When the boss was sent to Long Island, he said very confidently that he was absolutely smooth. After drinking, he fully understood where the confidence came from, and it was true.The pleasant wine will probably hang to the cheekbones. The so -called comfortable but not dishonest seat (strong wine is strong. Friends who do not drink usually ask you to discuss with the boss before drinking).

A good shop that will visit again!

Original:
非常棒的小酒館。首推蒜味薯條，薯條現炸非常酥脆，搭配蒜味很好下酒，而且還有芥末鹽撒在上面，蒜味的香和芥末的微嗆，用最強力的方式刺激你的味覺，而搭配帶點苦味的斷頭台啤酒，說不出的滋味，彷彿冰與火之歌。如果想清淡一點，店裡還有水果口味的啤酒，用香甜搭配嗆辣也是很棒的組合。
食物方面我很愛的還有義大利麵，老闆麵的美味讓不愛吃辣的我屢次挑戰，就是越痛苦越爽快這種等級的美食。而其他口味的義大利麵也都推薦，德腸醋有點小辣又帶酸，這是我最愛的項目。其他白醬、青醬雞肉等等基本款的口味也都是水準之上。
另外也有提供調酒如桑格利亞等等，不在菜單上可以向老闆詢問。而紅酒都是老闆挑選過的，CP值也都非常高。
EN:
Very great tavern.The first push garlic flavored fries, fried fries are very crispy, with garlic flavors well, and mustard salt is sprinkled on it. Taste, with a bitter beer with a bit of bitter taste, the taste that cannot be said, like the song of ice and fire.If you want to be lighter, there is also a fruit -flavored beer in the store. It is also a great combination with sweetness with sweetness.
In terms of food, I also love the pastoral noodles. The deliciousness of the boss made me repeatedly challenged when I do n’t like spicy food.And other flavors of the pasta are also recommended. The virtue vinegar is a bit spicy and sour. This is my favorite project.Basic flavors of other white sauce, green sauce chicken, etc. are also above the standard.
There are also bartending, such as Sanglia, etc., you can ask the boss on the menu.The wine has been selected by the boss, and the CP value is also very high.

Original:
這是我在2018年，聖誕節相遇的溫馨的餐酒館，第一次來到這裡我就深深的愛上這裡，這裡沒有網美的裝潢也沒有精緻擺盤的食物，但這裡有滿滿的溫暖。而且發現我認真一個月都至少來1次，每次都很認真吃、認真喝，根本沒有想要拍照留戀，吃都來不及了哈哈哈🤣

There are no mesh decorations or delicate foods, but there are full of them here. warmth.Moreover, I found that I came at least once a month, and I took it seriously every time. I didn't want to take a picture at all.
Spicy chicken wings, garlic flavors, salt and pepper pill eryngii, boss noodles ... Each is very delicious, the wine is also delicious, and the boss's special adjustment is nothing to say.Regardless of the day before the holiday or get off work, no matter which time, it is a great time, and you will feel full of happiness ❤️ You must leave 5 stars!Intersection
